name: McKenna Townsend
tagline: Marketing and Public Relations Agency Hampshire.
description: McKenna Townsend is a multi-award winning, full service marketing and public relations agency based in Hampshire. Located in Ringwood on the borders of Dorset, Hampshire and Wiltshire, we are relentless in the pursuit of results for our clients - devising and implementing both creative and strategic marketing, public relations and digital campaigns that drive enquiries, sales and build brands and reputation on a regional, national and international scale.
